title: The future of the Champions League
description: Will the super league be the future of the Champions League? The European Super League was a proposed annual club football competition that would have been contested by twenty European football clubs...

title: Just how good is Andres Iniesta?
description: Andres Iniesta is a Spanish professional footballer who plays as a central midfielder for Vissel Kobe in the J1 League. He spent most of his career at Barcelona, where he served as the captain for three seasons...

title: Where does Xavi rank among the best midfielders?
description: Xavi is a Spanish professional football manager and former player who is the manager of La Liga club Barcelona. Widely considered one of the greatest midfielders of all time, Xavi was renowned for his passing, vision, and playmaking ability...
